titleStmt.title: Lo here her type who was of latt [sic], the propp of Belgia [by] Io. Davies ; [--] sumpter Elizabetha Regina, Nic. Hilliard delin. et excud. cum priuilegio Maiestatis.
titleStmt.author: Davies, John, 1565?-1618.
Delaram, F.
Hilliard, Nicholas, 1537 (ca.)-1619.

publicationStmt.publisher: Are to be sould at [--] in Lumbard Streete by Roger Daniell,

notesStmt.note: Engraved port. of Queen Elizabeth, accompanied by verse by John Davies; engraving attributed to F. Delaram by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: faded, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
